description: Overview of all pod & node resource requests, limits and usages WITH CLUSTER & DATASOURCE SELECTOR

panels.description:
This represents the total [CPU resource requests](https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/configuration/manage-compute-resources-container/#meaning-of-cpu) in the cluster.
For comparison the total [allocatable CPU cores](https://github.com/kubernetes/community/blob/master/contributors/design-proposals/node-allocatable.md) is also shown.
panels.title: CPU Cores

panels.description:
This represents the total [memory resource requests](https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/configuration/manage-compute-resources-container/#meaning-of-memory) in the cluster.
For comparison the total [allocatable memory](https://github.com/kubernetes/community/blob/master/contributors/design-proposals/node-allocatable.md) is also shown.
panels.title: Memory

targets.expr: sum (eagle_pod_container_resource_requests_cpu_cores{nodegroup=~"$node_group", cluster=~"$cluster", node=~"$node.*", namespace=~"$namespace"}) by (pod, container, namespace)
sum (eagle_pod_container_resource_limits_cpu_cores{nodegroup=~"$node_group", cluster=~"$cluster", node=~"$node.*", namespace=~"$namespace"}) by (pod, container, namespace)
sum (eagle_pod_container_resource_usage_cpu_cores{nodegroup=~"$node_group", cluster=~"$cluster", node=~"$node.*", namespace=~"$namespace"}) by (pod, container, namespace)
sum (eagle_pod_container_resource_requests_memory_bytes{nodegroup=~"$node_group", cluster=~"$cluster", node=~"$node.*", namespace=~"$namespace"}) by (pod, container, namespace)
sum (eagle_pod_container_resource_limits_memory_bytes{nodegroup=~"$node_group", cluster=~"$cluster", node=~"$node.*", namespace=~"$namespace"}) by (pod, container, namespace)
sum (eagle_pod_container_resource_usage_memory_bytes{nodegroup=~"$node_group", cluster=~"$cluster", node=~"$node.*", namespace=~"$namespace"}) by (pod, container, namespace)

title: Kube Eagle v2
